duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct comprehensive patient interviews while adhering to Financial Assistance Program standards.
Verify potential of third-party coverage and determine if patients meet criteria for assistance programs.
Complete applications for patients in need of third-party assistance programs.
Accurately enter patient information into the hospital information system, i.e., Epic.
Comply with regulatory compliance standards by explaining various documents and obtaining signatures.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required, A minimum of two years of college preferred
